item.name: Get All Profiles User Token Test
Get All nutrition with filters and sorting

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Full Body Blast",
  "description": "A mix of strength and cardio for total body conditioning",
  "isShared": false,
  "workoutExercises": [
    {
      "exerciseName": "Squats",
      "sets": 4,
      "reps": 15,
      "duration": 120,
      "calories": 100,
      "orderInWorkout": 1,
      "notes": "Go below parallel"
    },
    {
      "exerciseName": "Push Up",
      "sets": 3,
      "reps": 20,
      "duration": 60,
      "calories": 50,
      "orderInWorkout": 2,
      "notes": "Keep elbows tucked"
    },
    {
      "exerciseName": "Bench Press",
      "sets": 3,
      "reps": 12,
      "duration": 90,
      "calories": 80,
      "orderInWorkout": 3,
      "notes": "Explosive jump at the end"
    }
  ]
}

request.description:
You can filter the request results or sort it via request params such as

> workouts?sort=name,asc  
workouts?name=Cardio
